BootCommerce

A components library of e-commerce site, it's based on Bootstrap

Components

  • Basket with items
  • Bread crumbs
  • Empty basket
  • Footer of site
  • Header of site
  • Horizontal products carousel
  • Image viewer
  • Mini basket
  • Pagination
  • Product filter checklist
  • Product filter removeable
  • Product infos tab
  • Product search
  • Product swatch
  • Products list view
  • Products thumbnail view
  • Promotional code
  • Quick info box
  • Registration
  • Sign in & register
  • Site navigation
  • Slide show
  • Store locator
  • Store locator detail
  • Summary text
  • Vertical products carousel
